Grand Master Xenos:
Congratulations! You have now become a proud Dark Elf Wizard. Life as a Dark Wizard may still be unfamiliar, but do not be anxious. You can learn the skills you need one step at a time from the nearby masters.
May you become a mighty Dark Wizard who makes the world tremble at the very mention of the names of Shilen and Gran Kain! Congratulations once again!
Our guild has prepared this small gift to assist you in your journey. Take this to the Grand Master, Grand Magister, Master Trainer or High Priest who permits transfers in any major town and you will be able to exchange it for a usable Shadow Weapon.
